title: Salem Maritime National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Reservations Free reservations are required for all ranger-guided tours. You can make reservations in-person at the Visitor Center or by calling 978-740-1650.  Special Park Uses Interested in using the park for a special event or special use? Learn about Special Use Permits.
